topic: Alcaraz wins US Open Men's Singles, reclaims world No 1 ranking.
evaluation: The primary continuous story identified covers Carlos Alcaraz's journey to win the US Open Men's Singles title. This narrative begins with his semi-final victory over Novak Djokovic and Jannik Sinner's parallel semi-final win against FÃ©lix Auger-Aliassime, culminating in the men's final where Alcaraz defeated Sinner. The articles include both live coverage and detailed match reports, providing significant and logically sequenced coverage. Articles pertaining to the women's singles tournament, while relevant to the overall US Open, were deemed separate storylines and categorized as noise to maintain strict relevance and continuity for the chosen men's singles narrative.
